insert into track_package ( uuid, package_name, module_name, start_commit, start_commit_date, end_commit, end_commit_date, repo_uuid, branch, version ) VALUES
( #{item.uuid}, #{item.packageName}, #{item.moduleName}, #{item.commonInfo.startCommit}, #{item.commonInfo.startCommitDate}, #{item.commonInfo.endCommit}, #{item.commonInfo.endCommitDate}, #{item.commonInfo.repoUuid}, #{item.commonInfo.branch}, #{item.trackerInfo.version} )

insert into raw_package ( uuid, root_uuid, version, change_relation, commitid, committer, commit_date, commit_message, parent_commit, repo_uuid, branch ) VALUES
( #{item.uuid}, #{item.trackerInfo.rootUUID}, #{item.trackerInfo.version}, #{item.trackerInfo.changeRelation}, #{item.commonInfo.commit}, #{item.commonInfo.committer}, #{item.commonInfo.commitDate}, #{item.commonInfo.commitMessage}, #{item.commonInfo.parentCommit}, #{item.commonInfo.repoUuid}, #{item.commonInfo.branch} )
mapper.select: select version,uuid from track_package where module_name = #{moduleName} and package_name = #{packageName} and repo_uuid = #{repoUuid} and branch = #{branch} order by version desc limit 1
